Class FileSystemTree.FileNode

java.lang.Object
FileSystemTree.FileNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
FileSystemTree
protected static class FileSystemTree.FileNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
FileNode class to handle the nodes of the tree. A node can be created either for a file or a directory

  • Method Details

    • isFile

      public boolean isFile()
      Method to check the node is file or not
      Returns:
      true if is file; otherwise, false

    • hasCapacity

      public boolean hasCapacity()
      To check array is has enough capacity to add a new node
      Returns:
      true, if used less than capacity and it is not file; otherwise, false

    • resize

      public void resize()
      Increases the array size If the node is a File, prints an error
